report.title: Guide to Brewing Ayahuasca
report.author: MindFuck
report.bodytext: After many unsuccessful experiences where I vomited violently before I could metabolize the brew, a few random chances, and alot of exploration I've finally found a process to get the most DMT per glass of Ayahuasca with the least nausea (I still got naseous though). /n /n I don't eat or drink anything at a minimum of 6 hours before, preferably 9 hours before. On to the preperation. /n /n Preperation time: 1 day and 1 night for processing. /n /n Syrian rue has to be the most horrible tasting thing in the world, next to hungarian goulash. I grind my syrian rue with a coffee grinder, go to the store and get some gelcaps, open the gelcaps, spill the contents, and spend a helluva lot of time pushing grounded rue into them. I like to dust off each gelcap after I'm finished fabricating them as to avoid tasting it. /n /n Ingredients: /n /n 1 fresh lemon /n 3 dissovable/grindable vitamin C tablets /n 1 ounce of mimosa hostilis (or whatever DMT plant you prefer) per 2 people /n sugar /n cut T-shirt /n large pot /n small pot /n clear plastic/glass container to store in freezer /n /n 1. Put 1/3 lemon juice, 1 vitamin C tablet and 1/2 pot of water into the small pot /n /n 2. Throw mimosa into simmering water (don't boil or you run the risk of evaporating the dmt) /n /n 3. simmer for 45 mins /n /n 4. place T-shirt over the large pot as you pour contents of small pot into it. /n /n 5. place contents of the T-shirt back into another pot filled with the same mixture. /n /n 6. repeat 2 more times. /n /n 7. discard root bark after last time /n /n 8. feel free to filtrate again if the remaining mixtures looking kinda chunky. /n /n 9. place remaining liquid into clear container and let sit overnight in the freezer. /n /n When your ready to consume: /n /n 1. Bring mixture out to thaw 6-9 hours in advance to injestion. It can be microwaved but I prefer room temperature brew compared to hot brew. Don't remove the ice from its container as it will mess up the whole purpose of freezing it: sedementation. /n /n 2. When it has properly melted you will notice 3 sedementated components: a dark poop looking substance at the bottom, a slightly darkend liquid in the middle, and some nasty grey stuff floating at the top. /n /n 3. Use a paper towel and remove the crap floating at the top. /n /n 4. Top off the clear looking liquid into a drinking glass careful not to disturb the poop, add as much sugar as possible without making it a syrup, usually 4 spoons is fine. /n /n 5. Drink up but not too much. If I drink till I'm full, I vomit very early. I take only about 2/3 cup.
